select nc_seq, nc_title, nc_comment, nc_view, nc_writer from notice_list where nc_seq=#nc_seq# order by nc_seq asc
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO notice_list( nc_seq, nc_title, nc_comment, nc_view, nc_writer ) VALUES ( NOTICE_LIST_SEQ.nextval, #nc_title#, #nc_comment#, 0, #nc_writer# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE notice_list SET nc_title = #nc_title#, nc_comment = #nc_comment# WHERE nc_seq=#nc_seq#
